author: Special Correspondent
text:
Three unidentified persons climbed up a mobile phone tower at Othakadai on Wednesday night, demanding lifting of ban on ‘jallikattu,’ giving tense moments to the police. According to the police, the trio climbed up the tower around 9.50 p.m., shouting slogans in favour of ‘jallikattu.’

A team of police personnel, led by Om Prakash Meena, Assistant Superintendent of Police, rushed to the spot to persuade them to come down.
title: 3 climb up mobile phone tower
